page.title: 07BOYS BRIGADE,HATCH BEAUCHAMP
page.content: The Boys and Girls Brigades are held in the Baptist Hall in Hatch Beauchamp on Fridays and Thursdays, except for holiday weeks. Boys Brigade starts at 18.45 and ends at 20.20. Our uniform is grey and blue with a blue hat. Subscription is ten pence each night. We have educational games and listen to Bible stories. We have a prayer and drill at the start and at the end of each session of Boys Brigade. Girls Brigade is on Thursdays at 18.30. We have a uniform which is navy blue. We play games such as board games and do colouring every meeting. After a story,a drill and a prayer, we end the evening with refreshments.
